name: Acrylic Nail Art
short_description:
If you've been doing your nails at home for yourself and doing manicures and designs for your friends too, you might want to think about going back to school to learn a new trade. Why? Nail art is really popular today - a hot industry to say the least! And if you've noticed how much you love it, maybe you'll want to take your beginner or even intermediate skills to a professional level. And you can do that right at home with some manicure courses online.

Today's online classes may include nail extension courses which teach you how to apply artificial tips with gel or acrylic overlays or even sculpting the extensions onto natural looking nails using forms and acrylics. http://nailart-design.webs.com/
